## Hello! 
 Hi Prof. Ostrow and Bella. This is my first stab at implementing the kind of interactive learning platform that I plan to use for my final project/capstone.

## Hello! (cont.) 
 As you'll see, there are a number of different ways to display information. These can be used sequentially to construct a lesson with many different components. This is super easy to do, because I've been able to store all the info in these nice little .json files that I can edit directly, without going into the source code of the application itself. ![Image of .json file](/scry/json_img.png)

## Drawing connections 
 Because all parts of the app are connected to a central state store, the map can be controlled simply by navigating the arrows. Click the marker to see.
